title: Hulk: The Movie (Trade Paperback)
description: After tampering with the outer limits of nature, mild-mannered scientist Bruce Banner finds himself - during moments of extreme stress - transformed into the walking engine of destruction known as the Incredible Hulk. Director Ang Lee is bringing his vision of the green goliath to movie screens across the world, and only Marvel can deliver the official comic book adaptation of the sure-fire smash hit. Plus some of the best HULK stories from the last two years! Collects the HULK MOVIE ADAPTATION, INCREDIBLE HULK #34, THE ULTIMATES #5 & a special 22-page adaptation of ULTIMATE MARVEL TEAM-UP #2-3.
